title: Echoes: Part One of Echoes & Silence
description: One death will lead to a new life, another will uncover a secret, and the many will tear out hearts. There will be war, there will be peace, and among it all the truth will surface and bury all the secrets forever. Continue the epic journey of loveâ€™s fight for survival in Part One of Echoes & Silence.
author: Angela M. Hudson
